reviews.title: Authentic Lithuanian food
reviews.body: Ertlio Namas is the perfect place to try traditional Lithuanian dishes. The atmosphere is cozy and the food is delicious.

reviews.title: Fine dining in a historic setting
reviews.body: Monte Pacis is a must-visit for anyone looking for an upscale dining experience. The restaurant is housed in a beautiful historic building and the food is top-notch.

reviews.title: Great food, even better cocktails
reviews.body: Gastrobaras is a hidden gem in Kaunas. The food is amazing, but don't miss out on the creative cocktails!

reviews.title: Burgers and craft beer
reviews.body: Soulbox is the perfect spot for a casual meal and drinks with friends. The burgers are fantastic and the craft beer selection is impressive.
